thread.section_title: Hotel le Tourville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel Tourville Eiffel
thread.title_full: Hotel Tourville Eiffel - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jai W
title: Hotel Tourville Eiffel
text: On arrival at the hotel, (located a 10 minute walk from the Eiffel tower) we were generously given a free upgrade to Executive suite, complete with a bottle of champagne on ice waiting in our room, which was a nice surprise. Staff were very friendly and helpful and always ready and happy to assist. Highly recommended.
